item.description:
Fiesta en la Casa de Jill en Watertown

Thursday May 13 7:00

Watertown is approximately 35-40 minutes from the Farmington/West Hartford area.
This will be a usual pot luck fiesta. Please bring a small amount a food/drink to share. Mostly Spanish conversation - all levels welcome Might even dance to some latin music if the crowd wishes. Any volunteers to give us a quick salsa lesson? :) Hope many of you can make it.

51 Bruce Street Watertown CT
Home: 860-417-3915
Cell: 860-417-9883

From the Hartford area:

Travel west on I-84 until exit 20 which will bring you to route 8 north. Take exit 37 (Watertown exit) off route 8. Take a left off the exit (This is route 262) You will travel through one set of lights and then take a right at the second set of lights. When you take the right you will still be on 262 (Buckingham St). Approximately half a mile up Buckingham street you will come to a flashing yellow light. Take a left at the light onto Nova Scotia Hill Rd, then take your next left onto Beach Avenue, The first right off Beach Avenue is Bruce Street. When you turn on to Bruce St, number 51 will be straight ahead of you.

GPS will bring you a slightly different way...but you'll still get there! :)

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fiesta en la Casa de Jill en Watertown
